categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2013 articles

nodes.text: Obi-Wan Kenobi: Wizard of the Desert

Obi-Wan Kenobi: Wizard of the Desert is an overview of the life of Obi-Wan Kenobi written by Ryder Windham and published in Star Wars Insider 112. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2013. Beginning from Kenobi's first days in the Jedi Order, the article follows his life from winning the position of Padawan to Qui-Gon Jinn, to his various encounters with Sith, to his adventures training Anakin Skywalker and in the Clone Wars, culminating in his exile to Tatooine and eventual death on the Death Star. The article also includes a brief profile of Kenobi, including his likes (the cooking of Dexter Jettster) and dislikes (Sith Lords).
